name: Idle Fishing
description:
Gather extra fishermen, manage your idle profits and become a fishing master with Idle Fishing!

Cast your line out and catch as many fish as possible to earn cash! With your cash you can pay for extra fisherman to help you out… more men = more money!

Rake it all in and soak up the glory as you watch the money pile up when you’re not around, but don’t forget to come back and claim your earnings.

Idle Fishing features:

Simple and addictive game play: Tap to catch as many fish as you can to earn money!
- Complete daily tasks to fill your wallet!
- Upgrade your rod and bait to discover new fish!
- Unlock new fishermen who will continue to earn money for you whilst you’re away!
